action.triggerCond: The Car booking company fails to provide the Car renters with the exact vehicle class the Car renters requested in their booking upon the Car renters' arrival.
action.note: The upgraded model must be within the same segment and in a neutral color.

action.description: Provide a comparable car, waive insurance costs, and offer free accessories.
action.triggerCond: The Car booking company fails to provide an upgraded model within the same segment in a neutral color.
action.note: The car must be of a comparable class and in a neutral color. All insurance costs from [trusted Insurer] must be waived. Accessories (e.g., child safety seats) must be offered for free.

action.description: Provide a discount on the customer's next rental.
action.triggerCond: The Car booking company fails to deliver a car of a comparable class in a neutral color, waive all insurance costs from [trusted Insurer], and offer accessories (e.g., child safety seats) for free within 120 minutes.
action.note: The discount is calculated proportionally to the duration of the delay.
